22.author: [No author]

Carver Pusey, Rube Goldberg, Edgar Rice Burroughs, George Herriman, Fontaine Fox, Milt Gross, Rea Irvin, H.T. Webster, Sidney Smith, Percy Crosby, Billy De Beck, Cliff Sterrett, and George McManus.
